attributes.action: Censure Alistair Darling for misappropriation of public funds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition Gordon Brown to censure Alistair Darling on his mis-handling of the 'tax payers' money, with regards to the present banking crisis.
This needs to be done with the utmost speed, before he completely bankrupts the country.

Further to this Gordon Brown should then be forced to stand down as Prime minister... a position he was never legally voted into.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
